Total school budget share

£282,254.72

Includes funding de-delegated to local authority as maintained school

£1,538.64

£1,538.64 from total school budget share is funding passed back to local authority for central services when this was a maintained school. After the school became an academy, the local authority kept £969.29 to continue to provide central services until March 2022.

£17,552.65 from the total school budget share should be spent based on the needs of SEN pupils.

Where the place numbers come from

Local authorities request high needs places from ESFA annually. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.
